name: axi-project-dashboard
description: axi-project-dashboard - Independent deployment progress visualization dashboard

scripts.build: pnpm --filter axi-deploy-dashboard-backend build && pnpm --filter axi-deploy-dashboard-frontend build
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter axi-deploy-dashboard-backend lint && pnpm --filter axi-deploy-dashboard-frontend lint
scripts.lint:fix: pnpm --filter axi-deploy-dashboard-backend lint:fix && pnpm --filter axi-deploy-dashboard-frontend lint:fix
scripts.typecheck: pnpm --filter axi-deploy-dashboard-backend typecheck && pnpm --filter axi-deploy-dashboard-frontend typecheck

author: 运维团队
